title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing our 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor - the perfect addition to elevate your home decor! These stunning iron frame mirrors boast a modern and artistic design, featuring a unique "circle on circles" pattern that is sure to captivate your guests. Each set includes two mirrors, allowing you to create a picture-perfect gallery wall or add a touch of elegance to any room.

These mirrors are versatile and can be styled independently or combined with other wall art such as paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces. The high-quality annealed glass prevents warping and distortion, ensuring a crystal-clear reflection every time. The frame is made of durable iron and finished in a beautiful gold color that is between matte and bright, adding a touch of sophistication to any space.

Measuring 15.7 inches in diameter with the frame and 10 inches alone, these medium-sized mirrors are perfect for any room in your home, including the living room, bedroom, bathroom, or entryway. They are easy to hang with just one screw, making installation a breeze. Plus, the mirrors come in a decent package for safe delivery right to your doorstep.

Upgrade your home decor with our 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor and experience the beauty of high-quality craftsmanship. Order now and add a touch of elegance to your living space!
